languages.text: {n}Старица глядит на Идиру с неподдельным почтением, приоткрыв рот и чуть кивая при каждом ее слове.{/n} "Брат предупреждал, что жрица-со-звезд ступит на землю этой правительницы в поисках ответов на свои вопросы. Как и сказал, что она возжелает пойти по дороге смерти, дабы обрести перерождение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Старица глядит на Идиру с неподдельным почтением, приоткрыв рот и чуть кивая при каждом ее слове.{/n} "Брат предупреждал, что жрица-со-звезд ступит на землю этой правительницы в поисках ответов на свои вопросы. Как и сказал, что она возжелает пойти по дороге смерти, дабы обрести перерождение".

languages.text: {n}The elder looks at Idira with genuine reverence, nodding slightly after every word, her mouth half-open.{/n} "This ruler's brother did warn that a priestess-from-the-stars would descend upon this ruler's land in her search for answers. Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."
languages.original_text: {n}Старица глядит на Идиру с неподдельным почтением, приоткрыв рот и чуть кивая при каждом ее слове.{/n} "Брат предупреждал, что жрица-со-звезд ступит на землю этой правительницы в поисках ответов на свои вопросы. Как и сказал, что она возжелает пойти по дороге смерти, дабы обрести перерождение".

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly priestess looks at Idira with genuine reverence, nodding slightly after every word, her mouth slightly open.{/n} "Brother did warn that the priestess from the stars would descend upon this ruler's land in her search for answers. Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

languages.text: {n}La anciana mira a Idira con genuina reverencia, asintiendo con la cabeza tras cada palabra con la boca entreabierta.{/n} «El hermano de esta jefa nos advirtió que la sacerdotisa de las estrellas descendería a las tierras de esta jefa en busca de respuestas. Tal y como predijo, ella querría emprender el camino de la muerte en pos de la reencarnación».
languages.original_text: {n}The elder looks at Idira with genuine reverence, nodding slightly after every word, her mouth half-open.{/n} "This ruler's brother did warn that a priestess-from-the-stars would descend upon this ruler's land in her search for answers. Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana sacerdotisa mira a Idira con genuina reverencia, asintiendo con la cabeza tras cada palabra con la boca entreabierta.{/n} «Hermano nos advirtió que la sacerdotisa de las estrellas descendería a las tierras de esta jefa en busca de respuestas. Tal y como predijo, ella querría emprender el camino de la muerte en pos de la reencarnación».

languages.text: {n}老妇人看着伊迪拉，眼里带着真诚的崇敬。她的嘴半张着，每说一句话就微微点头。{/n}“此酋长的弟弟确实警告过，说来自群星之间的女祭司会降临到此酋长的土地上，寻找答案。正如他所说，她渴望踏上死亡之路，以求重生。”
languages.original_text: {n}The elder looks at Idira with genuine reverence, nodding slightly after every word, her mouth half-open.{/n} "This ruler's brother did warn that a priestess-from-the-stars would descend upon this ruler's land in her search for answers. Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

traits.locale_text: {n}年迈的女祭司看着伊迪拉，眼里带着真诚的崇敬。她的嘴微微张开，每说一句话就微微点头。{/n}“我的弟弟确实警告过，说来自群星之间的女祭司会降临到此酋长的土地上，寻找答案。正如他所说，她渴望踏上死亡之路，以求重生。”

languages.text: {n}L'ancienne regarde Idira avec un respect sincère en hochant la tête à chacun de ses mots, la bouche entre-ouverte.{/n} « Parle-aux-Dieux avait prévenu cette dirigeante que la prêtresse des étoiles viendrait sur nos terres en quête de réponses. Il a également dit qu'elle voudrait emprunter la voie de la mort pour y trouver la réincarnation. »
languages.original_text: {n}The elder looks at Idira with genuine reverence, nodding slightly after every word, her mouth half-open.{/n} "This ruler's brother did warn that a priestess-from-the-stars would descend upon this ruler's land in her search for answers. Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille prêtresse regarde Idira avec un respect sincère en hochant la tête à chacun de ses mots, la bouche entre-ouverte.{/n} « Parle-aux Dieux avait prévenu cette dirigeante que la prêtresse des étoiles viendrait sur nos terres en quête de réponses. Il a également dit qu'elle voudrait emprunter la voie de la mort pour y trouver la réincarnation. »

languages.text: {n}老人は心から敬虔なまなざしでイディラを見つめ、言葉を発するたび、口を半開きにしながら、わずかにうなずく。{/n}「支配者の弟は、星から来た司祭が答えを求め、この支配者の地に降りてくると警告していました。彼が言ったように、彼女は再誕を見出すために、死の道を下ることを望むでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The elder looks at Idira with genuine reverence, nodding slightly after every word, her mouth half-open.{/n} "This ruler's brother did warn that a priestess-from-the-stars would descend upon this ruler's land in her search for answers. Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は心から敬虔なまなざしでイディラを見つめ、言葉を発するたび、口を半開きにしながら、わずかにうなずく。{/n}「支配者の弟は、星から来た司祭が答えを求め、この支配者の地に降りてくると警告していました。彼が言ったように、彼女は再誕を見出すために、死の道を下ることを望むでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Die Alte blickt Idira mit echter Ehrerbietung an. Ihr Mund steht ein Stück weit offen und sie nickt nach jedem Wort leicht.{/n} "Der Bruder dieser Herrscherin hat gewarnt, dass eine Priesterin-von-Sternen auf ihrer Suche nach Antworten in das Land dieser Herrscherin kommen würde. Genau, wie er gesagt hat, will sie den Pfad des Todes beschreiten, um zur Reinkarnation zu finden."
languages.original_text: {n}The elder looks at Idira with genuine reverence, nodding slightly after every word, her mouth half-open.{/n} "This ruler's brother did warn that a priestess-from-the-stars would descend upon this ruler's land in her search for answers. Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Priesterin blickt Idira mit echter Ehrerbietung an. Ihr Mund steht ein Stück weit offen und sie nickt nach jedem Wort leicht.{/n} "Bruder hat gewarnt, dass die Priesterin von den Sternen auf ihrer Sache nach Antworten in das Land dieser Herrscherin kommen würde. Genau, wie er gesagt hat, will sie den Pfad des Todes beschreiten, um zur Reinkarnation zu finden."

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar, İdira'ya samimi bir hürmetle bakıyor. Söylediği her sözün ardından ağzı yarı açık bir hâlde, hafifçe başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bu hükümdarın kardeşi, yıldızlardan gelen bir rahibenin sorularına cevap ararken bu hükümdarın topraklarına ineceğine dair uyarıda bulundu. Tıpkı onun dediği gibi rahibe, ruh göçünü bulmak için ölümün yolundan yürümek istiyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The elder looks at Idira with genuine reverence, nodding slightly after every word, her mouth half-open.{/n} "This ruler's brother did warn that a priestess-from-the-stars would descend upon this ruler's land in her search for answers. Just as he said, she would wish to head down the path of death to find reincarnation."
